front.title: IPv6 Extensions for DNS Plug and Play

abstract.t: This document proposes automatic configuration of domain name (FQDN)for IPv6 nodes using Domain Name Auto-Configuration (called 6DNAC) asa part of IPv6 plug and play feature. 6DNAC allows the automaticregistration of domain name and corresponding IPv6 Addresses withthe DNS server. In order to provide 6DNAC function, Neighbor DiscoveryProtocol [2461] will be used. Moreover, 6DNAC does not require anychanges to the existing DNS system.
